epics.title: Epic: Core Framework Infrastructure
epics.body:
# Epic: Core Framework Infrastructure

## Overview
Build the foundational architecture for BQ Studio, including the Electron app shell, plugin system, and core services.

## Goals
- Set up Electron + React + TypeScript project
- Implement plugin loading system
- Create core services (AI, Database, File, Workflow)
- Build UI framework (Dashboard, Workspace)
- Set up event-driven architecture

## Success Criteria
- [ ] Electron app launches successfully
- [ ] Plugin system can discover and load plugins
- [ ] Core services accessible to plugins
- [ ] Basic UI shell renders
- [ ] Event bus working for plugin communication
- [ ] SQLite database initialized

## Dependencies
None - this is the foundation

## Sub-Issues
See linked issues below

## Estimated Effort
4 weeks

## Labels
`epic`, `core`, `infrastructure`, `priority-high`

## Related Documentation
- [Architecture Overview](.claude/docs/architecture.md)
- [Plugin Guide](.claude/docs/plugin-guide.md)

epics.title: Epic: Series Architect Plugin
epics.body:
# Epic: Series Architect Plugin

## Overview
Port the existing Series Architect skill (series-architect-2/) into a BQ Studio plugin. This is the flagship content creation plugin for planning 5-book series.

## Goals
- Create plugin structure following plugin-guide.md
- Port 6-stage workflow into plugin
- Build UI for each workflow stage
- Integrate beat sheet library
- Implement template system
- Add export pipeline (MD, DOCX, PDF)

## Success Criteria
- [ ] Plugin loads in BQ Studio
- [ ] All 6 workflow stages functional
- [ ] Beat sheets selectable and applied
- [ ] Templates rendered correctly
- [ ] Can complete full series planning end-to-end
- [ ] Export to all formats working
- [ ] Session resume capability

## Dependencies
- Epic: Core Framework Infrastructure (must be complete)

## Reference Implementation
`series-architect-2/` - existing skill to port

## Sub-Issues
See linked issues below

## Estimated Effort
4 weeks

## Labels
`epic`, `plugin`, `series-architect`, `priority-high`

epics.title: Epic: Manuscript Writer Plugin

issues.title: [Core] Set up Electron + React + TypeScript project
issues.body:
## Description
Initialize the BQ Studio project with Electron, React, and TypeScript.

## Tasks
- [ ] Initialize npm project with package.json
- [ ] Install Electron, React, Vite dependencies
- [ ] Configure TypeScript (tsconfig.json for main/renderer)
- [ ] Set up Vite for renderer process
- [ ] Create main process entry (src/main/app.ts)
- [ ] Create renderer entry (src/renderer/App.tsx)
- [ ] Configure Electron builder
- [ ] Test app launches with blank window

## Acceptance Criteria
- App launches successfully on Windows/Mac/Linux
- Hot reload working in dev mode
- TypeScript compiling without errors
- Can build production executable

## Technical Notes
- Use Vite for fast HMR
- Separate tsconfig for main/renderer processes
- Follow structure in .claude/docs/architecture.md

- `src/main/preload.ts`
- `src/renderer/App.tsx`
